summary: I got quite a few requests to make an Aetherial bow and arrows, so here it is :D
descriptionHtml:
I got quite a few requests to make an Aetherial bow and arrows, so here it is.

The Aetherial bow uses kinetec energy drawn from your heart beat to fling arrows at high speeds(it has Zephyr\'s Speed shooting enchantment). It is made using Zephyr as the base (like upgrading it).

The Aetherial arrows are created continuously by the quiver (I have not quite fixed the bugs with this yet so for now you can forge more from the ones you have).

They can be forged at the aetherial forge
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This mod does require Dawnguard
author: D0VAK11N
